title: Removed extension is kept by dev mode after restart

labels.name: area/devtools
labels.description: Issues/PR related to maven, gradle, platform and cli tooling/plugins

body:
### Describe the bug

I have an application, running in dev-mode. When I remove one of the extensions from the pom, dev-mode restarts, but the extension is still considered installed.

### Expected behavior

Running application should reflect changes in the pom.xml, extension removed from the pom should not be used in the app.

### Actual behavior

Extension is keep until manual restart

### How to Reproduce?

1. ` quarkus create app app --platform-bom=io.quarkus:quarkus-bom:3.1.0.Final -x=quarkus-smallrye-health,quarkus-resteasy-reactive`
2. `cd app`
3. ` quarkus dev -Dquarkus.platform.version=999-SNAPSHOT -Dquarkus.platform.artifact-id=quarkus-bom -Dquarkus.http.port=1101 -Dquarkus.platform.group-id=io.quarkus` 
4. The log contains `Installed features: [cdi, resteasy-reactive, smallrye-context-propagation, smallrye-health, vertx]`, command ` curl localhost:1101/q/health` returns health status.
5. Run `quarkus extension remove quarkus-smallrye-health` from another console(or remove the extension manually from the pom.xml), result: `[SUCCESS] âœ…  Extension io.quarkus:quarkus-smallrye-health has been uninstalled`, pom doesn't contain `smallrye-health` anymore
6. Logs of the running app: 
```
[INFO] Changes detected to [/home/fedinskiy/code/quarkus/refresh/app/pom.xml], restarting dev mode
<...>
 Installed features: [cdi, resteasy-reactive, smallrye-context-propagation, smallrye-health, vertx]
```
command ` curl localhost:1101/q/health` returns health status.
7. Stop and start app manually. Log `Installed features: [cdi, resteasy-reactive, smallrye-context-propagation, vertx]`. Running curl over the health endpoint returns 404, as it should.

### Output of `uname -a` or `ver`

4.18.0-425.19.2.el8_7.x86_64

### Output of `java -version`

17.0.5, vendor: GraalVM Community

### GraalVM version (if different from Java)

_No response_

### Quarkus version or git rev

d60dea5d8c3e443e52ce859f2bb279ca96385db5

### Build tool (ie. output of `mvnw --version` or `gradlew --version`)

Apache Maven 3.8.7 (b89d5959fcde851dcb1c8946a785a163f14e1e29)

### Additional information

```
$ quarkus --version
2.14.3.Final # can be reproduced with 3.1.0.Final as well
```
